title: Integrated Design of Digital Media and Program Pedagogy for ESL Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Enhancing mathematics-integrated ESL education competencies for pre-service/inservice teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of designing ESL (English as a Second Language) lessons using digital media tools (interactive software, online platforms).
Learners can produce customized ESL math terminology content for different learner levels by applying programmatic teaching methods.
Learners can establish project-based assessment systems using digital evaluation tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
